project_name.justification: The press release is titled 'West Point Gold Expands Gold Chain Land Package by 30%' and discusses the 'Gold Chain Project in Arizona'.

company_name.justification: The press release is issued by 'West Point Gold, (TSXV: WPG) (OTCQB: WPGCF) (FSE: LRA0) ("West Point Gold" or the "Company")'. The 'About' section also states 'About West Point Gold Corp. (formerly Gold79 Mines Ltd.).'

ceo_buyer.justification: The text includes a quote from the CEO: "'This expanded area adds additional large-scale targets at Gold Chain... ' stated Quentin Mai, CEO..."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article describes the staking of new claims, which is an internal expansion, not an acquisition of a specific percentage interest from another party. No percentage of interest acquired is mentioned.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is named 'Gold Chain', the company is 'West Point Gold', and the text mentions 'gold discovery', 'gold bearing quartz events', and 'Previous sampling has returned up to 2.07 g/t Au.'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'West Point Gold Expands Gold Chain Land Package by 30%' and the content is entirely focused on the Gold Chain project, confirming its relevance.

currency.justification: The transaction described is the staking of claims, not a commercial acquisition with a specified currency. No currency is mentioned in the text.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is the staking of claims on government land, not an acquisition from another company. No cash payment is mentioned as consideration.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is the staking of claims on government land, not an acquisition from another company. No share payment is mentioned as consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction is the staking of claims on government land, not an acquisition from another company. No combined cash and share payment is mentioned as consideration.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction is the staking of claims on government land, not an acquisition from another company. No shares were issued as consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction is the staking of claims on government land, not an acquisition from another company. No shares were issued, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans such as mapping and sampling but does not specify a binding commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans but does not specify a binding commitment in terms of monetary expenditure.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or other royalty as part of the claim staking.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The total project area is calculated by summing the stated areas: 'The Gold Chain project now consists of 492 lode claims on BLM land covering 9,840 acres... and 15 patented claims, covering a total of 282 acres'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The total project area is calculated by summing the stated areas: 'The Gold Chain project now consists of 492 lode claims on BLM land covering 9,840 acres... and 15 patented claims, covering a total of 282 acres'.

resource_size.justification: The text indicates a resource has not yet been established, stating 'West Point Gold is focused on developing a maiden resource at its Gold Chain project' and also mentions 'the uncertainty as to whether further exploration will result in the target(s) being delineated as a mineral resource'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company is identified in the first paragraph of the text as 'West Point Gold, (TSXV: WPG)'.
